author: prasad
msg: * the parent artifact of all individual samples is now called "samples"
* the top most artifact is now called samples-parent
* configured all report plugins to inherited=false so that individual samples do not generate unwanted reports.

author: prasad
msg: * the parent artifact of all individual samples is now called "samples"
* the top most artifact is now called "samples-parent"
* configured all report plugins to inherited=false so that individual samples do not generate unwanted reports.
* unwanted reports were being generated as a side-effect of extending from genesis:project-config. Hence it wasn't used till now.
